item.title: print('Hello world!')
item.description: Welcome! My name is Roberto Garc√≠a Calero, I’m a Software Engineering student at the University of Seville and also a proud member of Geographica, an awesome location intelligence company! I want to introduce you Sento, my Undergraduate Thesis Project. The idea Sento, sentiment in Esperanto, will be the combination of the sentiment analysis teachings I will learn during this year and the professional experience I’m gaining as a GIS (Geographic Information System) engineer at my job.
